original_text: And no man was able to answer him a word, neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions.
korean_text: 한 마디도 능히 대답하는 자가 없고 그 날부터 감히 그에게 묻는 자도 없더라

sentences.original_text: And no man was able to answer him a word
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그에게 한마디도 대답할 수 없었으며

sentences.original_text: neither durst any man from that day forth
